ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Conveyors
ResearchProjectDef.description: Hauling things within a factory can be dangerous and tedious. Conveyor belts take care of this.\nUnlocks: Belts and fueling machines.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Item Sorting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Directing things to the proper area of the factory will streamline and diversify the factory layout.\nUnlocks: Simple puller, growzone puller and belt splitter for normal belts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Item Sorting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Sophisticated logistical implementation allows for advanced item sorting.\nUnlocks: Wall and underground belts, splitters, smart hoppers, as well as MKII, angle, and wall pullers.
